languages.text: {n}Своей метафорой Арлекин имеет ввиду, что он уже какое-то время сопровождает выживших эльдаров. Вот только о каком "очаге" идет речь вам неясно — быть может, он смог отыскать им новый дом?{/n}

{n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, but perhaps he has managed to find them a new home.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Своей метафорой Арлекин имеет ввиду, что он уже какое-то время сопровождает выживших эльдаров. Вот только о каком "очаге" идет речь вам неясно — быть может, он смог отыскать им новый дом?{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, perhaps he managed to find them a new home?{/n}

languages.text: {n}La metáfora del arlequín sugiere que ha pasado una temporada con los Aeldari supervivientes. No te queda claro qué es ese «hogar» del que habla; es posible que haya logrado encontrarles un sitio nuevo en el que vivir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, but perhaps he has managed to find them a new home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La metáfora del arlequín sugiere que ha pasado una temporada con los Aeldari supervivientes. No te queda claro qué es ese «hogar» del que habla; es posible que haya logrado encontrarles un sitio nuevo en el que vivir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}丑角的比喻让你意识到，他已经陪伴这些艾达灵族幸存者一段时间了。你不清楚他说的“壁炉”是什么，或许指的是他想办法为他们找到了新家。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, but perhaps he has managed to find them a new home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}丑角的比喻让你意识到，他已经陪伴这些艾达灵族幸存者一段时间了。你不清楚他说的“壁炉”是什么，或许指的是他想办法为他们找到了新家。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La métaphore de l'Arlequin laisse entendre qu'il accompagne les Aeldaris survivants depuis un certain temps. Le terme de "foyer" n'est pas clair, mais il signifie peut-être qu'il leur a trouvé un nouveau monde.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, but perhaps he has managed to find them a new home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La métaphore de l'arlequin laisse entendre qu'il accompagne les Aeldaris survivants depuis un certain temps. Le terme de "foyer" n'est pas clair, mais il signifie peut-être qu'il leur a trouvé un nouveau monde.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハーレクィンの比喩は、彼がしばらくの間、生き残ったアエルダリに同行していたことを示唆している。何の『囲炉裏』のことを言っているのかはわからないが、おそらく彼は彼らに新しい家を見つけることができたのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, but perhaps he has managed to find them a new home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハーレクィンの比喩は、彼がしばらくの間、生き残ったアエルダリに同行していたことを示唆している。何の『囲炉裏』のことを言っているのかはわからないが、おそらく彼は彼らに新しい家を見つけることができたのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Metapher des Harlekins lässt darauf schließen, dass er den überlebenden Aeldari seit einer Weile begleitet. Dir ist nicht klar, von welchem "Herd" er spricht, aber vielleicht ist es ihm gelungen, ein neues Zuhause für sie zu finden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, but perhaps he has managed to find them a new home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Metapher des Harlekins lässt darauf schließen, dass er den überlebenden Aeldari seit einer Weile begleitet. Dir ist nicht klar, von welchem "Herd" er spricht, aber vielleicht ist es ihm gelungen, ein neues Zuhause für sie zu finden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arleken'in metaforu, bir süredir hayatta kalan Aeldarilere eşlik ettiğini ifade ediyor. Burada bahsettiği "ocağın", tam olarak ne anlama geldiğini kestiremiyorsun. Belki de onlara yeni bir yuva bulmayı başarmıştır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Harlequin's metaphor implies he has been accompanying the surviving Aeldari for a while now. It is not clear to you what "hearth" he is talking about, but perhaps he has managed to find them a new home.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arleken'in metaforu, bir süredir hayatta kalan Aeldarilere eşlik ettiğini ifade ediyor. Burada bahsettiği "ocağın", tam olarak ne anlama geldiğini kestiremiyorsun ama belki de onlara yeni bir yuva bulmayı başarmış olabilir.{/n}
